results.text: RT @deadprogram: "your design is influenced by the languages you know"-@venkat_s #jrubyconf
Watching @venkat_s at @JRubyConf   He is killing it. Ridiculously funny. http://t.co/qINDboAP
No matter how many times I see @venkat_s speak can't help but think its not enough. Amazing messages, entertaining and brilliant. #jrubyconf
RT @soupmatt: "Programming concurrency in Java is like working with the mother-in-law. She is just waiting for you to fail." - @venkat_s @JRubyConf
composition is better than inheritance, but our language can lead us astray if inheritance feels more natural --@venkat_s #jrubyconf
OH: "Writing code that spits out xml should be given to people in prison" #jrubyconf
"composition is a better pattern to implement than inheritance"-@venkat_s #jrubyconf
"…and I have a Manager class, and like a manager, it does nothing..." --  @venkat_s #JRubyConf
"Programming concurrency in Java is like working with the mother-in-law. She is just waiting for you to fail." - @venkat_s @JRubyConf
"I have a class called the manager class. As you would expect the manager class does nothing"-@venkat_s #jrubyconf

@venkat_s: "Programming concurrently on the JVM is like working with your mother in law - always waiting for you to fail" #JRubyConf
